about_me.title: ABOUT ME
about_me.text: My name is Alexandra Deaconu and I am a passionate front-end web developer, originally from Romania and now living in Berlin. I look forward to new and exciting projects and always strive to deliver my best work. My goal is to make a significant contribution to the success of the organizations I work with to ensure mutual growth and prosperity.
about_me.cta: If you think Iâ€™d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.project_1: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.project_2: Dive into this exciting multiplayer drinking game. Draw a card and follow the fun instructions to keep the party going.
projects.project_3: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

contact.span: I'm here to help you solve any programming challenges, turn your ideas into reality or provide support for your projects.
contact.p: Fill out the form below or send me a direct message.
contact.cta: I look forward to collaborate with you!

policy.and agree to the processing of my data a: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
